name: Tera-Turbine
description:
Entry for the #onebuttonjam

Description

Frantic little arcade game fully playable with only one button. Get the best score and compete with other players thanks to online scoreboard.

Controls

Space by default (reconfigurable in the game's options)

YOU CAN USE YOUR KEYBOARD TO INPUT YOUR NAME

Credits

Code, Voice and SFX by Tselmek (@tselmek)

Music by Mike Daw (@mikedaw2000)
